relationships.notes: His wife, also of priestly descent, who shares in the miraculous birth.
Prophesies over his infant son in the Benedictus.

traits.piety: Righteous before God, walking blamelessly in all commandments.
traits.priestly_service: Serving in the temple division of Abijah when he receives the vision.
traits.doubt_and_sign: Questions the angel Gabriel and is struck mute until the birth.
traits.prophecy: Filled with the Holy Spirit, he utters the Benedictus, praising God for redemption.
